title: 1986년 Ralph Edward Phillips v. A.I. Murphy and Michael Turpen 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Ralph Edward Phillips v. A.I. Murphy and Michael Turpen. 판결일: 1986-07-16. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Ralph Edward PHILLIPS, Petitioner-Appellant, v. A.I. MURPHY and Michael Turpen, Respondents-Appellees
**판결일**: 1986-07-16
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Holloway, Logan, Seymour

## 변호인

Ralph Edward Phillips, pro se.

## 인용

- 796 F.2d 1303

## 판결문 요약

796 F.2d 1303
    Ralph Edward PHILLIPS, Petitioner-Appellant,v.A.I. MURPHY and Michael Turpen, Respondents-Appellees.
    No. 84-1841.
    United States Court of Appeals,Tenth Circuit.
    July 16, 1986.
    
      Ralph Edward Phillips, pro se.
      Before HOLLOWAY, Chief Judge, and LOGAN and SEYMOUR, Circuit Judges.
      HOLLOWAY, Chief Judge.
    
    
      1
      In accordance with 10th Cir. R. 9(e) and Fed.R.App.P. 34(a), this appeal came on for consideration on the brief of the petitioner-appellant and the record.  The State of Oklahoma filed no brief in this case.
    
    
      2
      This is an appeal from an order of the district court dismissing the petitioner's petition for a writ of habeas corpus brought pursuant to 28 U.S.C. Sec. 2254.  The petitioner pled guilty in two separate state cases.  In CRF 80-346, the petitioner was charged with lewd molestation of a minor.  In CRF 80-653, the petitioner was charged with one count of robbery with a firearm, one count of first-degree rape, three counts of sodomy, and two counts of kidnapping for extortion.  The state trial judge sentenced the petitioner to eighty years' imprisonment in CRF 80-653 and five years' imprisonment in CRF 80-346, with the sentences to run consecutively, for a total of eighty-five years.  I R. 30.
    
    
      3
      The petitioner argues that he should have been accorded an evidentiary hearing and that his guilty plea was the product of a misunderstanding and was not intelligently m...
